name: Mariel's First Day
description:
Game #13 in my "Jammie" series. For the other games, visit https://shibeyfacegames.itch.io/

Made for Weekly Game Jam week 109,  theme: 'A Sad Ending'

Today is Mariel’s first day on the job with the Witch’s Council.  She’s still a novice at magic, but she’ll do her very best! Help Mariel complete a variety of tasks before the Mistwood Rail train departs.

Controls:
[AWSD] or [Arrows] to move.

[Space] or [Shift] to switch between walking and flying.

[Mouse Click] to shoot towards the mouse cursor.

 [F] to interact.

Main Music compositions by: Jon Carr

Music teaser at the end of the game is "Cool" by Spring on OpenGameArt.org.
